content:
You stop for a moment to rest your tired legs. You’re feeling the aches in your muscles starting to fade and are just taking a swig from your canteen when you feel something hard poke you in the small of your back.

You leap to your feet and see Kal Iver standing behind you, walking staff in hand. “Got to watch your back down here,” he grins smugly. “Never know what might be lurking around the corner.”

Place 1  per Ranger on Kal Iver.

Clear Kal with   to challenge him to a race.
